thag19.1:18.3: Mahinda is “Great Indra”, the god of thunder.
thag19.1:36.3: Read akataññutāya. The “creation in myself” (ajjhattasambhavo) is craving.
thag19.1:51.1: This is a rare early use of ārammaṇa in the sense “support for” (i.e. “subject of”) meditation.
thag19.1:52.3: Take samudayaṁ as accusative of relation, equivalent to locative (although treated as genitive in commentary).
